articles.title: Flights disrupted after Airbus discovers intense sun radiation could impact flight control data - BBC
articles.description: The issue is thought to affect 6,000 planes, which will need to undergo an urgent software update or have computers replaced.

articles.title: No. 16 Texas spoils No. 3 Texas A&M's perfect season 27-17, knocks Aggies out of SEC title game - AP News
articles.description: Arch Manning threw a touchdown pass and ran for the clinching score late in the fourth quarter and No. 16 Texas beat No. 3 Texas A&M 27-17 on Friday night to spoil the Aggies’ undefeated season and knock them out of the Southeastern Conference championship ga…

articles.title: Hegseth order on first Caribbean boat strike, officials say: Kill them all - The Washington Post
articles.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth issued a verbal order to kill all crew members in the Sept. 2 strike on a suspected drug boat. Navy SEALs fired a second missile.

articles.title: Source: Lane Kiffin is lining up LSU staff - NBC Sports
articles.description: Mississippi coach Lane Kiffin has said he'll make his decision on whether to stay put on Saturday.

articles.title: Game Recap: Bears best Eagles on Black Friday, improve to 9-3 - Chicago Bears
articles.description: The Bears rushed for 281 yards and two touchdowns and their defense generated two takeaways and permitted just two TDs in a 24-15 win over the Eagles Friday at Lincoln Financial Field.

articles.title: You can pick up 32GB of DDR5 RAM with a whole PC for $999 for Black Friday - The Verge
articles.description: RAM memory isn’t cheap right now, so instead of getting parts piecemeal, perhaps buying a prebuilt gaming PC from Walmart or Best Buy for Black Friday is the move.

articles.title: No West Virginia National Guard troops deployed in D.C. have asked to leave since deadly shooting, governor says - CBS News
articles.description: "I haven't heard of anyone step back," Gov. Patrick Morrisey told CBS News in an interview. "They wanted to stay. They wanted to complete the mission and serve their state and country."

articles.title: Boise State 25-24 Utah State (Nov 28, 2025) Game Recap - ESPN
Northwestern reaches $75M deal with Trump administration to get federal funding reinstated - Politico
articles.description: The school expects federal funds will start flowing within days and be fully restored within 30 days.

articles.title: Jessica Simpson Reveals She Spent Thanksgiving with Family and Estranged Husband Eric Johnson: 'Family First' - Yahoo News UK
articles.description: Jessica Simpson told TMZ that “of course” she spent Thanksgiving with her estranged husband Eric Johnson, who joined her and the rest of the family at Simpson’s mother Tina’s house.

articles.title: 2025 Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade Gobbles Up Record 34.3 Million Viewers Across NBC and Peacock - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: NBC's live airing alone topped 25 million viewers.

articles.title: Israeli forces fatally shoot 2 Palestinians after they appeared to surrender - The Washington Post
articles.description: Israel opened a formal probe into the killings after footage of the incident circulated that showed two men shot at close range as they lay on the ground.

articles.title: Megan Thee Stallion Cooked Thanksgiving Dinner for Klay Thompson, Posts Video of Meal - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Dallas Mavericks forward Klay Thompson gave Megan The Stallion's Thanksgiving Day cooking a "10 out of 10."

articles.title: Detroiters say the chaos, and spirit, of Black Friday shopping is gone - The Detroit News
articles.description: Gone are the days when deal lovers cut Thanksgiving short to stand in line for hours at the crack of dawn for steep discounts.

articles.title: Trump claims he will nullify executive orders Joe Biden signed by autopen - Al Jazeera
articles.description: The US president asserted that 92 percent of Biden’s orders were illegitimate, citing legally dubious autopen claims.

articles.title: I’m a laptop reviewer, and these are the Black Friday deals I’d shop—many are over $400 off - The Verge
articles.description: Black Friday is the best time to get a big discount on laptops, with quality deals on Apple MacBooks, Windows laptops, gaming machines, Chromebooks, and even some accessories.

articles.title: Oil Futures Settle Lower in Slow Black Friday Trade - The Wall Street Journal
